name: Black Ops 6
description: Call of Duty's newest edition, Black Ops 6 is here, and as usual, jam packed with action and an all star cast of new characters

name: The Last Of Us
description: After a global pandamic that destroys civilisation as we know it, one man and a 14 year girl may be humanities last hope of survival

name: Days Gone
description: Days Gone is a post-apocalyptic open world action adventure love story, where you play as an outlaw biker on a mission to find his lost lover in a zombie infested world

name: Modern Warfare 2
description: Call of Duty's newest edition, Modern Warfare 2 is here, and as usual, jam packed with action and an your favorite characters back

name: GTA 5
description: GTA 5 is an action-adventure masterpiece where you will be plunged into the chaotic city of San Andreas where you will be the one creating the chaos

name: Detroit Become Human
description: Detroit Become Human is one of the move submersive si-fi games ever made. Step inside the mind of an android where every choice has consequenses

name: PS5 Pro
description: Playstation 5 Pro is here and and fully loaded with upgraded cpu, graphics card, providing serious gamers with a richer gaming experience

name: PS5 TLOU Edition
description: The Last Of Us Playstation 5 Edition is here. Get this limited edition PS5 jam packed with the last of us easter eggs for the die hard Last of Us gamers out there who want a little piece of gaming history

name: PS5 Slim
description: The Playstation 5 Slim, is only slim on the outside, but it comes packed with an upgraded cpu and 2TB of storage and 120FPS

name: PS5 Controller
description: The official Playstation 5 controller feels like no other. it fits you hand like a glove and will enhance your gaming experience

name: PS5 Custom Controller
description: Do you know why the Call Of Duty Pro's are so good? One reason is they know that having a fully custom contorller with paddles make the TTK (time to kill) much much faster

name: PS5 Headphones
description: Witness the Playstation 5's newest edition: a fine set of headphones to make your gaming experience all that much more immersive
